item.title: DNS Netbook: From Russia with MeeGo
item.description: At the recent Mobile World Congress 2011 in Barcelona the folks over at Netbook News spotted this 10.1-inch netbook by Russian PC maker DNS.

item.title: MSI Wind U160 Running SUSE Moblin at MWC
item.description: Back in January at CES 2010 the MSI Wind U135 running SUSE Moblin attracted lots of attention and now at Mobile World Congress there shows up another MSI Wind.

item.title: Compaq Airlife 100 Smartbook at Mobile World Congress
item.description: In this video Chippy from Carrypad gets his hands on the Compaq Airlife 100 at Mobile World Congress 2010, which currently takes place in Barcelona, Spain.
